titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31993D0591 English
93/591/EC: Council Decision of 8 November 1993 concerning the name to be given to the Council following the entry into force of the Treaty on European Union

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: 93/591/EC: Council Decision of 8 November 1993 concerning the name to be given to the Council following the entry into force of the Treaty on European Union
body.p: COUNCIL DECISION of 8 November 1993 concerning the name to be given to the Council following the entry into force of the Treaty on European Union (93/591)

The Council shall henceforth be called the 'Council of the European Union` and shall be so designated, in particular in all the acts which it adopts, including those adopted under Titles V and VI of the Treaty on European Union; political declarations which the Council adopts under the common foreign and security policy will thus be made in the name of 'the European Union`.
